Assuming pipeline and LDC mark-ups remain constant, the delivered prices were adjusted for the NYMEX Henry Hub projection of wellhead prices for the 2000-2001 winter period. There is no perfect candidate, nevertheless the positive impact of finally having a change in the party in power after 71 years is beyond our forecast ability. At last, we are going to have more checks and balances in the system with all the benefits that they will bring to the country to a more democratic way of doing things.
